Text: Re Alternative proposal Cc Thank you for your email we will get back with you after we have had an opportunity to look into this situation Sincerely Ashley Kerr EES HR Janice Avery on AM To cc Subject Alternative proposal Ashley I suggest that a meeting with you be scheduled to discuss an alternative severance proposal as your package does not reflect the lifethreatening illness that I contracted while working for Enron in Nicaragua nor does it appear to take into consideration many other issues such as the difficulty of obtaining a comparable position at my age Please call me today to set up a meeting with you at a location other than the office Get your FREE download of MSN Explorer at intlasp
